subject: Meta AI 5.0
description_text:
Page Policy Reminder

Review Your Page Activity
Some posts may need your confirmation

Hello Dr. Emily Carter,
We noticed that a few recent activities on your Page may need a quick review to ensure they meet the platform’s current content standards. This is a routine check that helps keep your Page in good standing.
You can review and confirm the details here:
Review Page 

Completing this step helps prevent any impact on your Page’s visibility or ad delivery.
Thank you for taking a moment to review,Page Quality Team
